label: Perception - To what extent does the persona feel like a realistic, human-like character?
description: (1 = Clearly a machine, 5 = Natural and human-like)

label: Relatability - To what extent did you feel a personal connection or sense of relatability with this persona, compared to general chatbots?
description: (1 = No connection at all, 5 = Strong connection)

label: Appropriateness - Did the chatbot’s responses reflect a consistent, persona-specific knowledge or way of thinking?
Aim: Usefulness in the context of informative query

label: Relevance - Did you find the agent’s recommendations and conversation topics relevant or interesting to you?
description: (1 = Not at all relevant, 5 = Very relevant)

label: Engagement - Did this persona add to your enjoyment or engagement, compared to chatting with a plain or non-personalized chatbot?
description: (1 = Not at all, 5 = Definitely made it more enjoyable)
Aim: check this specific persona versus other persona or no persona at all

label: Usefulness - How much did the chatbot's personality improve the usefulness of the interaction?
description: (1 = Not at all, 5 = Greatly improved it)
